name: MTI Radiocomp ApS
tag_list: rrh, obsai, cpri, remote-radio-heads, local-converter, lte, wimax, umts, wcdma, 4g, multi-mode, multi-carrier, broadband, duplexer, filter, sdr, software-defined, 802-16e, 802-16m, 3gpp, ieee
overview:
Radiocomp ApS is a leading provider of systems and components for next generation mobile and wireless networks. Radiocomp is the first company in the world to develop and manufacture state-of-the-art, fully software-configurable remote radio heads (RRH) and components for mobile WiMAX, WCDMA and LTE radio networks.

Radiocomp is also the market leader in silicon independent OBSAI RP3/RP3-01 and CPRI Cores. Moreover, Radiocomp’s solution framework includes a local converter digital reference design enabling base station vendors to support optical access over CPRI or OBSAI. Please visit Radiocompâ€™s website at www.radiocomp.com. For sales contact sales@radiocomp.com.
